# fmc_sgt_objects (Resource)

resource "fmc_prefilter_policy" "prefilter_policy" {
				name        = "Prefilter Policy"
				description = "Terraform Prefilter Policy description"
				default_action { 
					log_end = true
					log_begin = true
					send_events_to_fmc = true
					action = "BLOCK_TUNNELS"
				}
			}
